column4: basically the problem is that the computer keeps freezing when I'm doing things over the network - transfering a few files between machines via FTP is a prime example. I used to have a WEP network but now I'm connecting to a WPA-PSK one. Although it seems to connect OK, could this be the problem?
WPA generally belongs more to the problem set than the solution set
does it sound to you that it could be causing my system to lockup?
unlikely, but if that's the only change you've made since the problem started...
